Question: On August 28 at Forest Hills Tennis Stadium, the group was heckled by an audience still annoyed by this person's electric sound.
Hints: From February 1961, this person played at various clubs around Greenwich Village.
Allen Ginsberg accompanied the troupe, staging scenes for the film this person was simultaneously shooting.
In July 1965, this person released the single "Like a Rolling Stone", which peaked at number two in the U.S.
